ancient power.name: Ancient Power
ancient power.description: May raise all user's stats at once.

attract.name: Attract
attract.description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

baton pass.name: Baton Pass
baton pass.description: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

beat up.name: Beat Up
beat up.description: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

belly drum.name: Belly Drum
belly drum.description: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

conversion 2.name: Conversion 2
conversion 2.description: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

destiny bond.name: Destiny Bond
destiny bond.description: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description: Opponent's attack doesn't affect you, but may fail if used often.

encore.name: Encore
encore.description: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

false swipe.name: False Swipe
false swipe.description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

giga drain.name: Giga Drain
giga drain.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

heal bell.name: Heal Bell
heal bell.description: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

hidden power.name: Hidden Power
hidden power.description: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

lock-on.name: Lock-On
lock-on.description: The next move the user uses is guaranteed to hit.

milk drink.name: Milk Drink
milk drink.description: User recovers half its max HP.

mind reader.name: Mind Reader
mind reader.description: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

mirror coat.name: Mirror Coat
mirror coat.description: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

morning sun.name: Morning Sun
morning sun.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

pain split.name: Pain Split
pain split.description: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

perish song.name: Perish Song
perish song.description: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: User is not affected by opponent's move.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.description: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

sleep talk.name: Sleep Talk
sleep talk.description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

snore.name: Snore
snore.description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.description: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

spite.name: Spite
spite.description: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is raised two stages.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

triple kick.name: Triple Kick
triple kick.description: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

twister.name: Twister
twister.description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

vital throw.name: Vital Throw
vital throw.description: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.
